FuncDef:
The timestamp enable command enables the timestamp function for a system.
The undo timestamp enable command disables the timestamp function. The timestamp enable command enables the timestamp function for a system. The undo timestamp enable command disables the timestamp function. By default, the timestamp function is disabled for the system.
ExtraInfo: To enable the timestamp function for a system, run the timestamp enable command. After this function is enabled, the time for querying the system configurations is displayed each time you run the display command.
